medical_history.chief_complaint: Several weeks of substernal chest pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The chest pain began several weeks ago, occurring consistently with exertion and subsiding after 15 minutes of rest. The patient also experiences dyspnea and diaphoresis during episodes. He denies any chest pain at rest, paroxysmal nocturnal dyspnea, palpitations, presyncope, syncope, or lower-extremity edema.
medical_history.social_history: Employed as a financial planner, lives with his wife and 2 children, no significant history of tobacco, alcohol, or illicit drug use.
